title: Teemo in One for all
body: Teemo should be in One for all but he isnt, which is dumb. Sure it might get annoying with the shrooms but they have always been annoying. I thought this was suppose to be a fun mode? There are a number of other champions that are more annoying than teemo. So, Rito please let Teemo in one for all to make this yordle happy. {{champion:17}}

replies.body: What is more annoying than stepping over 50 mushrooms?
Hiemerdinger.
5 {{champion:30}} ultis at the same time.

5 {{item:3157}} at the same time
{{champion:432}}  - Ult
{{champion:122}}  - Q 
{{champion:60}} - Spider form E
{{champion:114}} - W out of existence 
{{champion:105}} - Anti-logic pole
{{champion:10}} - Ult
{{champion:203}} - Tryndameres #1 Fan
{{champion:127}} - Ice Age
{{champion:80}} - Skyrim jump
{{champion:35}} - Get split in half from the ult and has 100% hp
{{champion:16}} - Sigh...  It always ends the same, why keep trying?
{{champion:223}} - 5 Tahms eat each other at the exact same time, creating a paradox in the universe causing all traces of Tahm in all of Runteria and time to suddenly vanish.
And then the Karthus team just staggers their ults and you only get to block one. But which one will you block? The answer is that it doesn't matter; they hurt too bad no matter how much MR you have.

well 1. you cant take damage form all of them, only from one, each extra shroom jsut refreshes the damage.
2. have you played against heim?  they drop 6 turrets in lane and then spam taunt/laugh/joke and you cant do shit to them, every.  if you try you die.
3. {{champion:26}} can permastun you becuase the bombs stack with a -90- FUCKING PERCENT AP RATIO
 or lissandra, 5 ults that make you unabel to react, or give them a free healing zhonyas, 5 Leblancs nuking you all at once, 5 ashes machine gunning you down at once... i mean i coudl go on all day, the only champ worth permabanning is karthus becuase his ult can instakill the entire team, times 5.
Eh, there are bans in One for All.  I'm fine with Teemo being an option.
so i cant play {{champion:17}}  {{champion:30}}  but {{champion:74}} with 15 turrets is ok? WTF???
I agree Rex if Roit allows these champs but not teemo it doesnt mane much sense o me. I may lose with teemo but i at least had fun with him.{{champion:17}}
Rito will just remove all the annoying champions for One for all and remove Ban phase. Apparently we're too stupid to ban a champion if it bothers us.

I did this on a custom game like 10 minutes ago...
Nowhere is a safe zone...

From some who has been playing Teemo since S1: he's too much for All-4-1.  Even with Pink wards, sweeper, and oracles, the enemy has to stop and clear.

Then if you have the TP and sight potential.  Every mushroom serves as a miniward.  That's a huge advantage with the current ward limits.

Trust me, Disabling Teemo in this mode is not a bad thing.

> [{quoted}](name=AJStarhiker,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=TjBGVcof,comment-id=0017,timestamp=2015-10-18T13:33:08.914+0000)
>
> From some who has been playing Teemo since S1: he's too much for All-4-1.  Even with Pink wards, sweeper, and oracles, the enemy has to stop and clear.
> 
> Then if you have the TP and sight potential.  Every mushroom serves as a miniward.  That's a huge advantage with the current ward limits.
> 
> Trust me, Disabling Teemo in this mode is not a bad thing.

Honestly half the champs are too much for all for one. Sona,karma,trist,heim,galio, zilean ect. That doesn't make it right to disable teemo because these champs are even more annoying than teemo.
Join a custom match, works for me

I still don't get how Riot has found time to make tweaks to champs for other game modes (heals on urf for instance, was it?) but after a YEAR (or longer, I can't even remember, haven't there been TWO prior cycles of One for All already) they still haven't decided on a tweak for OfA teemo? They just flat out disable him, STILL? How freakin' hard can it be to make a decision on how to balance one champ in an experimental gamemode after more than a year? Maybe two?

Max clearly you dont know teemo at all. Or maybe you forgot that he got nerfed big time over the last several patches. Galio is more annoying. Lux, Karma, Jinx, Fizz, Heim these are only a small sample of champs that are more annoying than teemo. Ps his shrooms arent that strong ok maybe on a squishy champ it does lots of damage but teemo is also squishy.

> [{quoted}](name=tommyagun,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=TjBGVcof,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-10-16T17:55:18.926+0000)
>
> Max clearly you dont know teemo at all. Or maybe you forgot that he got nerfed big time over the last several patches. Galio is more annoying. Lux, Karma, Jinx, Fizz, Heim these are only a small sample of champs that are more annoying than teemo. Ps his shrooms arent that strong ok maybe on a squishy champ it does lots of damage but teemo is also squishy.

Teemo is also fast, and you don't know that the enemy team is going to pick teemo. It's not draft, it's lottery based. Clearly you don't know teemo or the game format at all. And sorry, but when the map will be covered with mine fields all over, because five teemos hurts. The nerf wasn't a huge one either, and 400 damage shrooms, not including liandries damage, magic pen, or any ap that may be built will hurt the team. Teemo effectively makes it impossible to move anywhere ever without taking serious injuries.

I'd rather see karthus unbanned before teemo is, as karthus doesn't make it impossible to move.

So please, tell me how I don't know teemo, yet you're trying to have him re-enabled in a game mode where he is incredibly toxic.

The only way you can lose to 5-man Teemo is if you literally let them. Almost any OFA assassin team will just shit on Teemo.

Marksman will outrange and outdps Teemo, and can simply sweep and pink ward their pathings.

Tanks will just bruteforce through fields and not give a shit.

There are SO MANY other match-ups that are obscenely lopsided that Riot won't look into, but somehow Teemo is "zOmg permaban" even though the only time I got to play him, we got shat on by OFA Ekko.

I spectated my friends playing teemo on the first day and you clearly don't know how toxic he is on the map if you're complaining about him getting banned I mean it was funny af to watch but the map wasn't manoeuvrable at all by the enemy lux team they just died !
Then you know what you do? CAP the number of shrooms a Teemo can have. They did it for Urf, why the fuck is this any different?

Teemo's ult is pretty weak when compared to other champions ults. His ap ratios are also bad. He is also mana hungry because each spell he has cost a lot of mana it is 125mana for his ult 110 for his q and 70 mana for his w this is way too much when compared to other champs. Ziggs for example has lower mana costs better ap ratios and his ult does more than 400 base damage. An offtank can go through 3 shrooms and lose only a quarter of health. Max I think you have no idea about teemo. Im pretty sure you don't play him because his speed isn't that much not compared to karma or galio speed spells. YOu also make claims about teemo that would be true for season 4 and early parts of season 5 but for the last several months teemo has been nerfed a lot. He is a high risk low reward champ atm. Honestly his ult should last at least 7minutes when fully upgraded and have better scaling. People just hate teemo so much because of one or two of his spells. He isn't op at all so I don't understand all hate. People should be more annoyed at a broken champ or champ that is op atm.{{champion:17}}

> [{quoted}](name=tommyagun,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=TjBGVcof,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-10-16T18:56:25.534+0000)

Ziggs for example has lower mana costs better ap ratios and his ult does more than 400 base damage. An offtank can go through 3 shrooms and lose only a quarter of health. Max I think you have no idea about teemo. Im pretty sure you don't play him because his speed isn't that much not compared to karma or galio speed spells. YOu also make claims about teemo that would be true for season 4 and early parts of season 5 but for the last several months teemo has been nerfed a lot. He is a high risk low reward champ atm. Honestly his ult should last at least 7minutes when fully upgraded and have better scaling. People just hate teemo so much because of one or two of his spells. He isn't op at all so I don't understand all hate. People should be more annoyed at a broken champ or champ that is op atm.{{champion:17}}

You're really ignorant, aren't you? Yes, other champions use less mana, and yes, their ults do more damage. But guess what. Teemo's ult isn't a, you get hit once thing, it's a you place this, usually in an area, and take a multiple of 400 damage. And it isn't hard to just shroom up the base. They aren't that mana intensive of abilities, especially when any mana regen is there.

> [{quoted}](name=MaxStormyStorm,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=TjBGVcof,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-10-16T20:37:18.756+0000)
>
> You're really ignorant, aren't you? Yes, other champions use less mana, and yes, their ults do more damage. But guess what. Teemo's ult isn't a, you get hit once thing, it's a you place this, usually in an area, and take a multiple of 400 damage. And it isn't hard to just shroom up the base. They aren't that mana intensive of abilities, especially when any mana regen is there.

Teemo's abilities are mana intensive. Go and play teemo once and you will see that he is really easy to beat.

No. Just no. Blinds all over, and then the map will literally be covered in shrooms that not only do a good chunk of damage, but last ten minutes and provide free vision. That's just overpowered as hell.
Sona is more over powered in One for All. @ lvl 6 group mid, too much heal, Q poke. Try to all in 5 ults to the face.

Last ten minutes ?
*sigh*
Do someone here read the patch note ?
_MaxStormyStorm, the next time he goes against a Teemo : "OMFG BOUNCING SHROOM REPORT TEEMO FOR HACK"_
I honestly think every champion should be playable in one for all

Well you did make some mistakes: teemo has gotten nerfed since then, teemo is more dangerous in aram than in sr due to the ability to group more shrooms in less room, also it was teemo vs teemo match, if you would have used a champ with some tank or any non squishy champ it wouldn't be a big problem really. There are other champs that should be disable more than teemo, but since a lot of people hate teemo they disabled him.

I actually played a Teemo vs Teemo All-4-1 when they did the everyone on both teams has the same champion.  The game.  Never.  Ended.  That one was on Howling Abyss, so there were permavision items (yes, I did build it).  By the time one side cleared enough mushrooms to just reach the outer edge of the turret, they other team was back up and dropping fresh mushrooms.

SR would be worse simply because True Sight is so limited there.
this will be aids at its best but fun lmao

Roit should just release teemo and see what actually happens. IF you hate teemo then ban him it aint hard to do.  Play as trist {{champion:18}} and win game in under 20 mintues if you want to win, but I just want to have fun. Everyone feared that Bard would be a troll champ but he isn't used as a troll champ. So, give teemo a chance maybe karthus because it isn't that hard to counter his ult.

Teemo (and Karthus) were active upon release and PBE testing of OFA. They only just today decided they were too oppressive.

Also, you can't counter Karthus' ult. Maybe one or two. But any Karthus that isn't brain-dead (ha. haha.) will quickly learn to use Requiem one after the other to use up your stasis/invulnerability skills and items. You can spend all your gold on MR and Zhonya's and Guardian Angel, but that 4th or 5th Karthus ult in a row will get you.

But I agree. Riot banning them isn't the best solution.

Yeah this is just like disableing champions in urf even though you get bans. Its a troll game mode in the first place why are they banning specific champions from it? stupid. But sense when does riot care about player feedback anymore

To be honest, it doesn't even feel like much fun since everyone gets so angry about winning and not getting the champs they wanted, they either give up too easily or just afk. 2 games with Bard that we could of won but 2 of my teammates refused to listen to advice or even try after a while....

No.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1979865649/208257366

I rather not......
Karthus too.
I can't believe you people forgot that in URF mode, Teemo gets his ult capped. Why the fuck couldn't they just cap Teemo shrooms again, if they're so much of a problem? Lazy is what that is. >_>

I posted something similar to this in the announcement for 1 for all, please help teemo play 1 for all everyone! 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/OEM6XAE2-spin-spin-spin-spin-spin-to-win-one-for-all-returns?comment=0091

Seriously, when the gamemode just came out yesterday teemo was avalaible( Go look at my match history for proofs) and they are some champion that are way more worse then him like veigar. I think he should be available because even if you can get a mushroom feild up you can still counter him and have fun just by building a little bit of magic resist

I'm sorry but no....if it forced the enemy team to go teemo also i'd be fine with that but its just like the karthus scenario, if all of your team picks a certain area to nuke then you'll endlessly get kills. I mean, could you imagine 5 teemos going CDR and then making SR a complete minefield? Thats sounds like situational fun, in which one team is having fun and the other team cant leave their base without getting shredded by 20 mushrooms infront of their nexus.

(Ya'know like heimer in OvA? Thats a good example of situational fun)

I 1/2 main {{champion:17}} and i dont think that would be a good idea, i can see it now....

{{champion:17}} *K guys we are pushed to our inhibs..wut to do?..*

{{champion:17}} "NP m8, i gots an idea"

{{champion:236}}{{champion:236}}{{champion:236}}{{champion:236}}{{champion:236}} *Enemy team shows up*

{{champion:236}} "Yaaa, lets get the nexus guys, its unguarded!!"

*Steps on, shroom, after shroom as they walk up to the nexus*

{{champion:17}} *Double Kill!!*
{{champion:17}} *An enemy has been Slain!!*
{{champion:17}} *Ace!!*

{{champion:17}}{{champion:17}}{{champion:17}}{{champion:17}}{{champion:17}} *Backdoors from bot lane*

{{champion:17}}  *That One Teemo that built {{item:3085}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3072}} {{item:1306}} {{item:3060}}  {{item:2137}} *

{{champion:17}} "Aaayyyyyyyyyyyyyy we won!"

Being honest teemo's shrooms are just annoying and that is it. They are not very strong even when you hit several at once unless you are playing a glass champ. I know there are plenty of champs that can walk through the shrooms and barely lose any health. Secondly, it ain't very hard to get rid of the shrooms get a sweeper.{{item:3364}} This item really reduces teemo's power. From personal experience the only people that complain about teemo are ones that don't use sweepers in a fight.
i don't think you understand 5 teemo's essentially make it so you can't leave base without dieing, they are literally impossible to deal with.
